website_summaries.verdict: Known for anything that's golf, Callaway's expertise of the sport has transcended even on their footwear. Belonging to their collection of high-performance shoes, the LaGrange combines comfort and style that appeals to both newbies and professionals. Though it does require time for break-in, it serves as a temporary glitch that is easily forgettable.
pros: The majority of Callaway LaGrange reviewers proclaim that this is the golfer's answer to those looking for comfortable shoes
According to several users, the spikes provide traction on different areas, including elevations and soggy greens
It is evident that this trainer is well-made and uses top-quality leather, a winning combination among several golfers
The classic exterior of this version fits some of the fashionably-conscious individuals
Some of the commenters much appreciate the stability that this Callaway golf shoe gives
The waterproof upper comes very useful for a couple of players
Because of the leather upper, one can attest that cleaning and shining it can be done effortlessly
cons: Numerous purchasers recommend breaking-in this model first before taking it on the full swing because it tends to rub on the sides and heel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are really nice! Light, comfortable, and feel great on the course. The only thing thing is they fit a size to a half size too large, otherwise, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: It had more soft spikes on the shoes that gave me more stability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Rub on the sides and heal may have to send them back
customer_reviews.author: Ron Dale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as I expected and not a scratch on them... even though the box was broken it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Rude Boi Pride

customer_reviews.title: Liked the wide-sized option!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has wide feet and we have a hard time finding comfortable and stylish golf shoes. These were a great solution!
customer_reviews.author: susiesreviews

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shoes, but caused a blister on both heals first time out. Never had that happen with Foot Joys
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size wide E, and the shoe is pretty tight seems narrow in the toe
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: most Comfortable shoes i have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoes i have ever owned. I have diabetes type 2 feet felt good after 18 holes
customer_reviews.author: Joe Berry

customer_reviews.title: Not wearing them anymore
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a blister on my heel/Achilles every time I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were comfortable to wear. Got them in 2 days as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Gigglebox

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the grip but the back of the shoes hurt my tendons.
customer_reviews.author: gary dalton

customer_reviews.title: Size runs larger
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 8 in golf shoes, these shoes are half size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Lalo

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very light and comfortable. Gives good stability during full swing. Like the minimalistic design and looks classy. Got lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: James E

customer_reviews.title: great golf show and service
customer_reviews.text: My husband has another pair in gray so why not white for summer. I reviewed the previous order. Great shoes and great service.
customer_reviews.author: pamela moffet

customer_reviews.title: One of the best golf shoes bought
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this shoes a lot. It made me very confortable when playing golf in whatever conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Callaway Men's Lagrange Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: A next level fusion of traditional design on a performance platform. The LaGrange will comfort your feet with a full-grain leather upper, and inject a new level of performance into your game with the POWER drive Platform.
feature_bullets: Full-grain leather upper with opti-dri waterproof protection
Duo-Max midsole allows for a soft & comfortable feel on top, with structure and support built underneath
Fusion Lite TPU outsole with (9) removable Silver Tornado spikes built for maximum stability & grip
TPU heel stabilizer for additional support during the swing
